text:
Team SFN is considering two solutions for their driver restraining system:
Solution A is from a well-known manufacturer based in Europe. Their 2020 system includes an antisubmarine strap, two shoulder straps and two lap belts, all belts have a width of 75mm. The system will be bought new from the manufacturer in 2020 and it meets the FIA specification 8853/2016.
Solution B is a second hand system in mint condition, previously used by a rallycross team. This 6- point system has belts with a minimum width of 75mm and it meets SFI Specification 16.5. The manufacturing date on the label reads 01/01/2020.
Which solution(s) is/are compliant with the rules and eglible to use at FSN2020?
